pullRequest.title: Summarising booleans operators
pullRequest.bodyText: AND/OR should be able to inject exists-selects that will create aggregations of all filtersNodes below them

commit.message: wip sketch outlining how Or-Nodes create aggregators of underlying exists-Selects
Add test for AND/OR injecting ExistsSelects

afterCommit.message: Add test for AND/OR injecting ExistsSelects

commit.message:
Revert "Deserialize Worker Messages in Namespace"

This reverts commit 56468aaf
Set default Label to CPSTypeAnno and get Label for AND/OR injected ExistsSelect

change name of field to create aggregator.
Add test for CQAnd#createExists

nodes.bodyText: Oben fügst du den Aggregator als letztes zum QueryPlan, dann müsstest du die Resultinfo auch hier als letztes anfügen.
Kannst du hier noch den Datensatz ergänzen um eine Entity die nicht im Ergebnis auftaucht?

commit.message: create sub directory for logical tests
test for aggregators injected by OR/AND
rework AND/NEGATION test to be clearer

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/develop' into feature/summarising-booleans-operators
